name: Fell Seal: Arbiter's Mark
description: Fell Seal: Arbiter's Mark is a turn-based tactical RPG with a focus on storytelling and strategic battles. Unfold a mature story as you progress through hand-crafted scenarios, controlling your own group of Arbiters, with each character customizable from a wide selection of classes and abilities!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: 1.2 Ghz, Pentium 4+ Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible with 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: 2+ Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible with 1024MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
